member.name: T:Deploy.PackageBuilder
member.summary: Builds an MSI installer.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.ProductName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the name of the product.
member.remarks: The product name is used as the installation package title, and appears in the Windows Programs list. It is also used as the directory name in the Program Files directory, and as such, must not contain any illegal characters.
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.ProductIcon(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the product icon filename.
member.remarks: The product icon is used in the Windows Programs list.
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.Author(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the package author.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.Platform(Deploy.PackagePlatform)
member.summary: Sets the target platform for the package.
member.remarks: MSI installation packages can be targeted at either 32 or 64-bit platforms. Based on this setting, the package will install to either Program Files (x86) or Program Files on a 64-bit system.
member.param: The target platform for the package.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.UpgradeCode(System.Guid)
member.summary: Sets the upgrade code for the package.
member.remarks: The upgrade code must remain consistent for the same application. It is used by Windows to upgrade older versions of the same application. If the upgrade code changes, Windows assumes that a new and different application is being installed.
member.param: The upgrade code for the package.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.Version(System.Version)
member.summary: Sets the package version.
member.remarks: The version is used by Windows to track upgrades of the same application. Newer versions will replace older versions, but an older version cannot replace a newer version.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.File(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a file to the package to be installed.
member.remarks: When a shortcut icon is specified, an icon is placed in the Start Menu. The icon appears at the root level of the Start Menu with the icon name specified.
member.param: The filename of the file to be added.
An optional parameter specifying the path to the icon to be used for the Start Menu.
An optional parameter specifying the name of the icon to display in the Start Menu.
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageBuilder.Build(System.String)
member.summary: Builds the MSI package to the specified filename.
member.param: The filename of the MSI package.
member.exception: The parameter is null or empty.
A validation error or other platform error occurred

member.name: T:Deploy.PackageException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an installation package fails to build.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageException.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageException.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specifed error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specifed error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of the exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
The inner exception that is the cause of the exception.

member.name: M:Deploy.PackageException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The object that holds the serialized object data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: T:Deploy.PackagePlatform
member.summary: Describes the target platform for the installation package.

member.name: F:Deploy.PackagePlatform.X86
member.summary: Targets 32-bit systems.

member.name: F:Deploy.PackagePlatform.X64
member.summary: Targets 64-bit systems.

member.name: T:Deploy.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Deploy.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Deploy.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Argument cannot be an empty Guid.

member.name: P:Deploy.Properties.Resources.Argument_NullOrEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Parameter cannot be null or empty.
